system.description:
Choose a weapon group from the following list: bows, combat swords, flexible weapons, fencing swords, axes, staffs, spears, picks,
or maces

Benefit

The character makes attack rolls with the weapon normally.

Normal

A character who uses a weapon without being proficient with it takes a -4 penalty on attack rolls.

Special

A character may take this feat up to nine times. Each time a character takes the feat, they select a different weapon group.

Tutoring

Time: 1 day

Categories: Bows, Combat Swords, Fencing Swords, Axes, Staves, Spears, Picks, Flexible Weapons, and Maces

Benefit: Attack penalty is reduced to -2
